storage::data::ResourceHandle< T > Class Template Reference

Database resource handle encapsulation. Type T should be declared with DB_DECLARE_HANDLE(). More...

#include <storage/data/resource_handle.h>

 Encapsulate an existing handle or NULL.

 Assign an existing handle or set to NULL.

 Encapsulate a shared resource.
 
ResourceHandle & operator= (const ResourceHandle< T > &other)
 Assign a handle for a shared resource.
 
bool operator== (const ResourceHandle< T > &other) const
 Equal if the other handle shares the same resource.
 
bool operator!= (const ResourceHandle< T > &other) const
 Not equal if the other handle does not share the same resource.

 Equal if the other handle shares the same resource.
 
bool operator!= (const T &other) const
 Not equal if the other handle does not share the same resource.
 
T handle ()
 Use the handle to modify the resource state.
 
const T chandle () const
 Use the handle to access the resource without modifying its state.
 

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class storage::data::ResourceHandle< T >

Database resource handle encapsulation. Type T should be declared with DB_DECLARE_HANDLE().
